SENT.plain: The electrocardiogram (ECG) signal is widely employed as one of the most important tools in clinical practice in order to assess the cardiac status of patients
The classification of the ECG into different pathologic disease categories is a complex pattern recognition task
In this paper, we propose a method for ECG heartbeat pattern recognition using wavelet neural network (WNN)
To achieve this objective, an algorithm for QRS detection is first implemented, then a WNN Classifier is developed

The experimental results obtained by testing the proposed approach on ECG data from the MIT-BIH arrhythmia database demonstrate the efficiency of such an approach when compared with other methods existing in the literature
